channel.title: SleepMedic Blog

item.title: Myth-Busting Sleep for Shift Workers: What You Need to Know
item.description: Discover the truths about sleep for shift workers. Learn how to protect your sleep against circadian disruption with evidence-based tactics.

item.title: Cultural Sleep Practices You Can Use for Better Rest
item.description: Explore sleep enhancement techniques from around the world—from Spanish siestas to Japanese inemuri—and how shift workers can adopt them for better rest.

item.title: Sleep Like a Warrior: Ancient Wisdom and Modern Practice
item.description: Learn how ancient warriors approached rest with intention and resilience. Four core principles for modern shift workers seeking better sleep.

item.title: Shift Workers: How to Get Sleep Like Your Life Depends on It
item.description: The one most important tool for shift workers to fix sleep for good: wake up at the same time every day. A 7-day challenge that actually works.
